== Valappad (627791) ==

Valappad is a village in the [[Chavakkad]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 1633 hectares and harbouring 8852 households with total population of 35237 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Chavakkad]] is at a distance of 26 km. Male population is 16208 and female population is 19029. Scheduled Caste Population is 977 and Scheduled Tribes population is 32. Census Location Code of the village is 627791<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
